metadata.title: CVE-2019-7321 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Usage of an uninitialized variable in the function fz_load_jpeg in ArtifexMuPDF 1.14 can result in a heap overflow vulnerability that allows anattacker to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
